name: Night of a Million Corpses
description: There you are sleeping in your bed when suddenly you hear screams of terror coming from outside. You get out of bed and look out your window and you see what looks like millions of demonic entities rushing toward your house! In order to survive The Night of a Million Corpses, you must hack and slash your way through waves of demons! Level up and gain new abilities and passives in order to defeat the ever so terrifying Belial! Will you be able to survive the onslaught of demons and defeat Belial? Get your shoes on, drink a coffee, and get to killing. It’s going to be a long night.
